title: r/AmITheA**hole For Tattooing My Baby?
description: r/AmITheA**hole In today's story, OP is the mother of twins. One of the twins has a medical condition that requires weekly medication. If the other twin takes this medication by mistake, it could result in severe health problems for both babies. So, at the recommendation of her doctor, OP decides to tattoo a tiny freckle on one of the boy's ears. OP's in-law freaks out when she found out, leaving OP to wonder if she was the butthole for doing this.
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
